message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a method for embedding intention recognition in support robots for search and rescue missions, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The method involves using Monte Carlo planning in partially observable environments (POMDP), which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses reward functions and entropy reduction, which are topics in machine learning (cs.LG). The use of sensory constraints and movement tracking suggests a potential application in computer vision (cs.CV). Finally, the focus on joint exploration strategies and safety considerations suggests a potential application in control systems (cs.SY).
